glosses.gloss: The capital and largest city of Ghana with a deep-water port
The Accra Metropolitan Area or simply Accra is the capital of the Republic of Ghana, with an estimated urban population of 2.27 million as of 2012.
아크라는 가나 공화국의 수도이자 약 227만 명의 인구를 가진 가나 최대의 도시이다.
Accra is a genus of moths belonging to the subfamily Tortricinae of the family Tortricidae.
